com.tomzhu.heap

Class BasicDoubleEndedHeap<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomzhu.heap.BasicDoubleEndedHeap<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of element

    public class BasicDoubleEndedHeap<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
    a simple min-max or max-min heap. A double ended heap can be seen as a union of min heap and max heap. it supports getMax and getMin operations with constant time overhead. @see here for the original paper of this structure.
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    tomzhu
